assumptions.label: Preferred learning style
assumptions.value: Small tasks tied to real outcomes

steps.name: Level 3 - Builder
steps.summary: Small bug fixes and behavior improvements

tracks.name: Scout Guild
tracks.whyItMatters: Great bug reports can unblock coders faster than raw code edits.
tasks: Submit one bug with full repro details
tracks.graduationSignal: At least 3 high-quality issues accepted as valid

tracks.name: Scribe Guild
tracks.whyItMatters: Better docs reduce repetitive support and speed up new contributors.
tasks: Add one FAQ answer for beginners
Rewrite one confusing paragraph in plain language
tracks.graduationSignal: One merged docs PR and one issue closed by doc update

tracks.name: UX Guild
tracks.whyItMatters: Usability and readability drive completion and retention.
tasks: Audit keyboard navigation in one flow
Report 3 confusing UI moments with suggestions
tracks.graduationSignal: Two UX issues fixed from your feedback

tracks.name: Ops Guild
tracks.whyItMatters: Cleanly scoped work lets everyone ship faster.
tasks: Convert one vague idea into acceptance criteria
tracks.graduationSignal: Backlog quality improves and issue cycle time drops

bytecasts.title: How to File a Perfect Bug Report
bytecasts.outcome: You can report issues that are immediately actionable.
bytecasts.action: Submit 1 bug report using the template in CONTRIBUTING.md.

bytecasts.title: Mobile-First Testing in 15 Minutes
bytecasts.outcome: You can catch breakpoints and touch interaction issues quickly.
bytecasts.action: Test Home, Onboarding, and Divisions views on a phone-sized viewport.

bytecasts.title: Editing JSON Without Fear
bytecasts.outcome: You can edit content data safely and validate output.
bytecasts.action: Update one offer outcome in offer-pack-data.json and refresh.

bytecasts.title: Write Docs People Actually Finish
bytecasts.outcome: You can produce concise docs with clear next steps.
bytecasts.action: Add one FAQ entry and one troubleshooting bullet.

bytecasts.title: Accessibility Basics for Contributors
bytecasts.outcome: You can check focus order, labels, and contrast quickly.
bytecasts.action: Run one keyboard-only pass and open one a11y issue.

bytecasts.title: From Suggestion to Accepted Task
bytecasts.outcome: You can propose scoped work with acceptance criteria.
bytecasts.action: Draft one feature request using the issue template.

bytecasts.title: First Tiny Fix in app.js
bytecasts.outcome: You can make and verify one safe behavior change.
bytecasts.action: Complete one Level 3 task from FIRST_TASKS.md.

bytecasts.title: Weekly Contribution Rhythm
bytecasts.outcome: You can contribute consistently without burnout.
bytecasts.action: Pick one task, one support action, and one retrospective note this week.
